description: This historic Florentine trattoria now has a slightly new look, with the open-view kitchen visible as soon as you enter the restaurant. The friendly and welcoming ambience here makes it a popular choice, so booking ahead is highly recommended. Delicious, authentic cuisine is to the fore, including delicious Florentine steaks and other classic favourites.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Visa credit card']
